title: How do I update my TalkBand B2 and the Huawei Wear application?
answer:
Before updating, make sure your TalkBand B2 is connected to your phone using Bluetooth.

● Updating your TalkBand B2: In the Huawei Wear application, touch the settings icon in the upper left corner and then touch Update TalkBand B2. Your TalkBand B2 will check for the latest software version and perform any available updates.

● Updating the Huawei Wear application: In the Huawei Wear application, touch the little man icon in the upper right corner. Touch About > App update. When your phone displays Updating... it will check for the latest version and perform any available updates.

Note:

While updating, your TalkBand B2 will disconnect the Bluetooth connection. Please wait until the update is complete.
